name: Skyline Secrets
description:
Skyline Secret is a two player strategic card game about an intense resource competition between two cities,
in their attempt to make the perfect fireworks display.
Both players have access to the same options of play and therefore the game is decided on skillful plays and outwitting your opponent.


Matches take less than five minutes to complete and the game has a very easy learning curve, with difficulty in mastery.

Feedback showed that the game is best played with a group of friends so give them the link and compete against each other!

Website: skyline-secrets.kaller.xyz

Discord: discord.gg/vXtm4gN
